mapper.select: select * from user where uid in (select user2 from `friends` f where f.user1 = #{uid}) union select * from user where uid in (select user1 from `friends` f where f.user2 = #{uid})
mapper.delete: delete from friendrequest where (`from` = #{user1} and `to` = #{user2}) or (`from` = #{user2} and `to` = #{user1})
delete from friends where (user1 = #{user1} and user2 = #{user2}) or (user1 = #{user2} and user2 = #{user1})
